title: Pessimism

fields.name: Pessimism:
fields.value:
- Affected cards with positive effects will do the opposite to whoever they affect (e.g. drawing instead of discarding a card)
- Affected cards with neutral/negative effects remain unchanged.

desc:
Post 1817
- Target a player and inflict **Gloom** 5 on them.
- For the rest of the game, every card to ever enter their hand will be permanently inflicted with the Pessimism effect.
